summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4271 for the improvement of Alley in block 10, Brooklyn Addition, being the alley between 12th Avenue Northeast and Brooklyn Avenue, from East 42nd Street to East 43rd Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 50794, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
